text: @realDonaldTrump Kraftmaid in Middlefield Ohio said if we get the coronavirus self Quarantine yourself self and apply for FMLA. Because the customers need their cabinets!!! Payroll tax credit is great but it won’t work where I work!!!  They won’t close down for the Coronavirus!!
